import { extend } from "lodash";
 
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import getSiteVars from "../site.var";
 
import {unitMath} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
 
export default styleMemoize(function () {
 
  const siteVars = getSiteVars();
 
  const {
    // absoluteBorderRadius,
    // bestTextColor,
    // black,
    borderColor,
    circularRadius,
    // darkWhite,
    // darkWhiteActive,
    // darkWhiteHover,
    // defaultBorderRadius,
    defaultDuration,
    defaultEasing,
    // disabledOpacity,
    // disabledTextColor,
    // firstReadableColor,
    // focusedFormBorderColor,
    focusedFormMutedBorderColor,
    // fontSize,
    // fullBlack,
    // getAbsoluteSize,
    // getActiveColor,
    // getBackgroundColor,
    // getBorderColor,
    // getColor,
    // getDownColor,
    getFocusColor,
    // getHeaderColor,
    // getHoverColor,
    // getInvertedBackgroundColor,
    // getLightActiveColor,
    getLightColor,
    // getLightDownColor,
    getLightFocusColor,
    // getLightHoverColor,
    getRelativeSize,
    getSize,
    getTextColor,
    // glyphWidth,
    // horizontalPadding,
    hoveredTextColor,
    // iconWidth,
    // inputBackground,
    // inputColor,
    // inputHorizontalPadding,
    // inputLineHeight,
    // inputPlaceholderColor,
    // inputPlaceholderFocusColor,
    // inputVerticalPadding,
    // internalBorderColor,
    // invertedDisabledTextColor,
    // invertedLoaderFillColor,
    // invertedLoaderLineColor,
    // invertedSelectedTextColor,
    // invertedTextColor,
    // invertedUnselectedTextColor,
    // lightTextColor,
    // lineHeight,
    // linkColor,
    // linkHoverColor,
    // loaderFillColor,
    // loaderLineColor,
    // loaderLineWidth,
    // loaderMargin,
    // loaderOffset,
    // loaderSize,
    // loaderSpeed,
    // midWhite,
    // mutedTextColor,
    offWhite,
    // pageFont,
    // pressedTextColor,
    // relativeBorderRadius,
    selectedBorderColor,
    selectedTextColor,
    solidBorderColor,
    // strongTransparentBlack,
    // strongTransparentWhite,
    subtleGradient,
    subtleShadow,
    // subtleTransparentBlack,
    textColor,
    transparentBlack,
    unselectedTextColor,
    // transparentWhite,
    // verticalPadding,
    veryStrongTransparentBlack,
    // white,
    // whiteBorderColor,
  } = siteVars;
 
  
  const checkboxSize = "17px";
 
  const checkboxBackground = "#fff";
 
  const checkboxFocusBorderColor = focusedFormMutedBorderColor;
 
  const checkboxActiveBackground = "#fff";
  const checkboxActiveBorderColor = selectedBorderColor;
  const checkboxActiveCheckColor = selectedTextColor;
 
  const labelDistance = "1.85714em";
 
  const checkboxFocusBackground = "#fff";
  const checkboxFocusCheckColor = selectedTextColor;
  
  const checkboxActiveFocusBackground = "#fff";
  const checkboxActiveFocusBorderColor = checkboxFocusBorderColor;
  const checkboxActiveFocusCheckColor = selectedTextColor;
 
  const sliderHandleSize = "1.5rem";
  const sliderLineWidth = "3.5rem";
  const sliderTransitionDuration = "0.3s";
  const sliderHandleOffset = unitMath(unitMath("1rem", "-", sliderHandleSize), "/", 2);
 
  console.log({sliderHandleOffset});
 
  const toggleLaneWidth = "3.5rem";
  const toggleHandleSize = "1.5rem";
  const toggleTransitionDuration = "0.2s";
 
  const handleBoxShadow = `${subtleShadow},0px 0px 0px 1px ${borderColor} inset`;
 
    
  return extend({}, siteVars, {
    
    checkboxSize,
    checkboxColor: textColor,
    checkboxLineHeight: checkboxSize,
 
 
    /* Label */
    labelDistance,
 
    /* Checkbox */
    checkboxBackground,
    checkboxBorder: `1px solid ${solidBorderColor}`,
    checkboxBorderRadius: getSize(3),
    checkboxTransition: `border ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
                          opacity ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
                          transform ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing},
                          box-shadow ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing}`,
 
    /* Checkmark */
    checkboxCheckFontSize: "14px",
    checkboxCheckTop: "0px",
    checkboxCheckLeft: "0px",
    checkboxCheckSize: checkboxSize,
 
    /* Label */
    labelFontSize: getRelativeSize("medium"),
    labelColor: textColor,
    labelTransition: `color ${defaultDuration} ${defaultEasing}`,
 
    /*-------------------
            States
    --------------------*/
 
    /* Hover */
    checkboxHoverBackground: checkboxBackground,
    checkboxHoverBorderColor: selectedBorderColor,
    labelHoverColor: hoveredTextColor,
 
    /* Pressed */
    checkboxPressedBackground: offWhite,
    checkboxPressedBorderColor: selectedBorderColor,
    checkboxPressedColor: selectedTextColor,
    labelPressedColor: selectedTextColor,
 
    /* Focus */
    checkboxFocusBackground: "#fff",
    checkboxFocusBorderColor,
    checkboxFocusCheckColor: selectedTextColor,
    labelFocusColor: selectedTextColor,
 
    /* Active */
    labelActiveColor: selectedTextColor,
    checkboxActiveBackground,
    checkboxActiveBorderColor,
    checkboxActiveCheckColor,
    checkboxActiveCheckOpacity: 1,
 
    /* Active Focus */
    checkboxActiveFocusBackground,
    checkboxActiveFocusBorderColor,
    checkboxActiveFocusCheckColor,
 
    /* Indeterminate */
    checkboxIndeterminateBackground: checkboxActiveBackground,
    checkboxIndeterminateBorderColor: checkboxActiveBorderColor,
    checkboxIndeterminateCheckOpacity: 1,
    checkboxIndeterminateCheckColor: checkboxActiveCheckColor,
 
    /* Disabled */
    disabledCheckboxOpacity: 0.5,
    disabledCheckboxLabelColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)",
 
    /*-------------------
            Types
    --------------------*/
 
    /* Radio */
    /* Uses px to avoid rounding issues with circles */
 
    radioSize: "15px",
    radioTop: "1px",
    radioLeft: "0px",
    radioLabelDistance: labelDistance,
 
    bulletTop: "1px",
    bulletLeft: "0px",
    bulletScale: (7 / 15), /* 7px as unitless value from radio size */
    bulletColor: textColor,
    bulletRadius: circularRadius,
 
    radioFocusBackground: checkboxFocusBackground,
    radioFocusBulletColor: checkboxFocusCheckColor,
    radioActiveBackground: checkboxActiveBackground,
    radioActiveBulletColor: checkboxActiveCheckColor,
    radioActiveFocusBackground: checkboxActiveFocusBackground,
    radioActiveFocusBulletColor: checkboxActiveFocusCheckColor,
 
    /* Slider & Toggle Handle */
    handleBackground: `#fff ${subtleGradient}`,
    handleBoxShadow,
 
    /* Slider */
    sliderHandleSize,
    sliderLineWidth,
    sliderTransitionDuration,
 
    sliderHandleOffset,
    sliderHandleTransition: `left ${sliderTransitionDuration} ${defaultEasing}`,
 
    sliderWidth: sliderLineWidth,
    sliderHeight: unitMath(sliderHandleSize,"+",sliderHandleOffset),
 
    sliderLineHeight: getSize(3),
    sliderLineVerticalOffset: "0.4rem",
    sliderLineColor: transparentBlack,
    sliderLineRadius: circularRadius,
    sliderLineTransition: `background ${sliderTransitionDuration} ${defaultEasing}`,
 
    sliderTravelDistance: unitMath(sliderLineWidth,"-",sliderHandleSize),
 
    sliderLabelDistance: unitMath(sliderLineWidth,"+","1rem"),
    sliderOffLabelColor: unselectedTextColor,
 
    sliderLabelLineHeight: "1rem",
 
    /* Slider States */
    sliderHoverLaneBackground: veryStrongTransparentBlack,
    sliderHoverLabelColor: hoveredTextColor,
 
    sliderOnLineColor: getLightColor("black"),
    sliderOnLabelColor: selectedTextColor,
 
    sliderOnFocusLineColor: getLightFocusColor("black"),
    sliderOnFocusLabelColor: selectedTextColor,
 
 
 
    /* Toggle */
    toggleLaneWidth,
    toggleHandleSize,
    toggleTransitionDuration,
 
    toggleWidth: toggleLaneWidth,
    toggleHeight: toggleHandleSize,
 
    toggleHandleRadius: circularRadius,
    toggleHandleOffset: "0rem",
    toggleHandleTransition: `
      background ${sliderTransitionDuration} ${defaultEasing},
      left ${sliderTransitionDuration} ${defaultEasing}
    `,
 
    toggleLaneBackground: transparentBlack,
    toggleLaneHeight: toggleHandleSize,
    toggleLaneBoxShadow: "none",
    toggleLaneVerticalOffset: "0rem",
    toggleOffOffset: "-0.05rem",
    toggleOnOffset: unitMath(unitMath(toggleLaneWidth,"-",toggleHandleSize),"+","0.15rem"),
 
    toggleLabelDistance: unitMath(toggleLaneWidth,"+","1rem"),
    toggleLabelLineHeight: "1.5rem",
    toggleLabelOffset: "0.15em",
 
 
    toggleFocusColor: veryStrongTransparentBlack,
    toggleHoverColor: veryStrongTransparentBlack,
 
    toggleOffLabelColor: textColor,
    toggleOffHandleBoxShadow: handleBoxShadow,
 
    toggleOnLabelColor: selectedTextColor,
    toggleOnLaneColor: getTextColor("positive"),
 
    toggleOnHandleBoxShadow: handleBoxShadow,
 
    toggleOnFocusLaneColor: getFocusColor("positive"),
    toggleOnFocusLabelColor: selectedTextColor,
 
  });
});
